headline: CVS Health Expands Retail Stores Into Heart Health And Wellness Hubs
summary: CVS Health (NYSE:CVS) is repositioning its retail pharmacies as broader health and convenience hubs, with a stronger focus on preventive care and in store services. The company is highlighting expanded heart health awareness and prevention programs as part of its consumer health initiatives. CVS is widening its wellness and beauty assortment by rolling out the "being" haircare brand, aimed at serving a range of diverse hair types. For you as an investor or customer, CVS Health now sits at...
